city.cs.engine

Class StaticBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody

  • public class StaticBody
extends Body
    A static body does not move under simulation, but dynamic bodies can collide with it.

    The underlying physics engine does not handle bodies smaller than 0.1 metres well, but static bodies can be as large as 50 metres without trouble.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaticBody(World w)
      Initialise a new static body with no shapes attached.
      StaticBody(World w, Shape s)
      Initialise a new static body with a single shape attached.
